mobiles.name: henry gardener
mobiles.long_description: Henry the Gardener is sitting here, looking drunk.
mobiles.description:
He is a tall but bulky man in his late fifties.  His features are worn with
decades of hard work and his somewhat crouched expression is one of deep
sorrow and depression.  He is haunted by a memory of a lost paradise.

mobiles.name: zombie
mobiles.long_description: A rotting zombie is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.
mobiles.description: Maggots crawl all over its decaying body.

mobiles.name: ghoul
mobiles.description:
It is a walking corpse with long fangs and long, sharp nails that most of
resemble claws.  Its eyes are a dark yellow colour and glare hungrily at you.

mobiles.name: skeleton
mobiles.description:
The dusty bones are almost brown.  It must have been buried for a very long
time.

mobiles.name: skeleton
mobiles.description:
The dusty bones are almost brown.  It must have been buried for a very long
time.

mobiles.name: zombie
mobiles.long_description: A rotting zombie is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.
mobiles.description: Maggots crawl all over its decaying body.

objects.name: candlestick
objects.description: A pewter candlestick is standing here.

extra_descr_data.description:
It is a rather old-looking three-armed candlestick made from pewter.  Its
candles are a yellowish white colour.

objects.name: brandy bottle
objects.description: A brandy bottle is lying here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The bottle is a special 'Dragon Blood' brandy bottle.  Its neck is shaped
like a small dragon's head.  Bottles like these are often worth a small
amount money, even when empty.

objects.name: brandy bottle
objects.description: A brandy bottle is lying here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The bottle is a special 'Dragon Blood' brandy bottle.  Its neck is shaped
like a small dragon's head.  Bottles like these are often worth some money,
even when empty.

objects.name: wheelbarrow
objects.description: A green-painted wheelbarrow is standing here.

extra_descr_data.description:
It is a heavy wheelbarrow made from solid oaken planks that have been painted
a dark, green colour.
It is a large metal shovel with a solid wooden handle.
It is a large metal rake with a solid wooden handle.

The dusty bones are almost brown.  It must have been buried for a very long
time.
A dusty skeleton is in an excellent condition.

objects.name: amethyst gem
objects.description: A large, beautifully polished amethyst has been left here.

extra_descr_data.description: It has a very deep purple colour.

objects.name: pendant silver
objects.description: A silver pendant has been left here.

extra_descr_data.description: It resembles Thor's hammer and appears to be made of solid silver.

objects.name: dagger silver
objects.description: A long silver dagger is lying here.

extra_descr_data.description:
It has a long, sharp blade that is made entirely from silver.  A small rune
has been engraved on the blade next to the hilt.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Assamite Clan Rooms.
rooms.description:
This is the Entrance to the clan room of the Death Clan.
The Assamite are an odd clan, many kindred are very
conserned with this clan and its closeness with the dead.
The Assamites see death not as somthing to be feared
but as a new begining and the wonders that it brings.

rooms.name: The Altar.
rooms.description:
This room's aura is strong.
You see a dark altar before a large religious icon.
The Assamite crest hangs upon a wall.
Large stone statues of robed skeletons flank the altar,
their dread gaze seemingly unending.
Large benches fill the remainder of the room, their brown wood gleaming.
Mist arises from incense burners placed about the walls.
A tall man dressed in robes stands at the altar, meditating.
He seems to be mumbling something to himself.

rooms.name: A hallway within the Assamite clan hall
rooms.description:
The hallways of the Assamite's clan rooms are as wonderous
as they are horrific. The walls and pillars adorned with intricate
carvings of the highest craftsmanship, carvings of death and decay.
The walls primarily have carvings of dead, decaying corpses, while
the pillars seem to be constructed of hundreds of polished skulls.

rooms.name: Anatomy Room.
rooms.description:
This room is bare of furniture except for a set of shelves and
one table upon which lies a single corpse, obviously recently
dissected for study. Many knives and doctor's tools lie about here.
This room is full of sights that would horrify anyone but you, a Assamite.  Large jars of blood and body parts are stacked upon a shelf;
Many corpses lie rotting in a corner. The stench of decay fills the air.

rooms.name: Dark Study.
rooms.description:
You stand within the private study of the Assamites.
This is where they keep all their secret books of necromancy.
The walls are filled with shelves full of texts on the anatomy of animals,
demons, dragons and even other vampires. Scrolls and parchments are scattered
about on tables and chairs.
Scholars and other individuals all come here to study the dark arts.
Every Assamite understands his or her immortality and learns to harness
its power for his or her own purposes.
A sense of darkness comes from the south, and you feel a cool draft from
the north.

rooms.name: The Meeting Room.
rooms.description:
This room is covered in dust, Cobwebs hang from the high ceiling.  
A large, round table is in the center of the room, and a circle of chairs
surrounds it. There are two head seats for your clan leaders.
Off to the far wall you notice an odd picture dipicting Joker in his youth.

rooms.name: A Pool of Blood.
rooms.description:
This room has only a large pool within it filled with blood.
The blood is said to heal a vampire, restore their vigore and
enrich their mind. The blood is also said to have some of Joker's
blood mixed within, this is belived to be a large source of the
Assamite's abilty to animate corpese and manipulate the dead.
Many hold this as sacred ground.

rooms.name: Mortuary.
rooms.description:
You feel the room's icy touch; a cold breeze claws at your face and bare skin.
The light from this room is dim and seems to darken as you move on.
Large slabs of stone are lined up like tables within the room.
The slabs contain the corpses of the varius monsters and specimens
that have fallen to your clan. Though you are not warriors, your skill
at magic has surpassed even that of the great Tremere.
Even you are amazed at how fast you have learned your magic
and gained a true understanding of the Dead.
The smell of rotting flesh fills your nostrils and gives your undead
nature a certain sense of joy.  How sadistic you must be to enjoy this.
Yes, this is a trait of your clan.  Death.  Decay.  You understand them
better than any.  And only you, a true Assamite, can look upon a 
corpse and see beauty.

rooms.name: A hallway within the Assamite clan hall
rooms.description:
The hallways of the Assamite's clan rooms are as wonderous
as they are horrific. The walls and pillars adorned with intricate
carvings of the highest craftsmanship, carvings of death and decay.
The walls primarily have carvings of dead, decaying corpses, while
the pillars seem to be constructed of hundreds of polished skulls.

rooms.name: A Stone Tomb.
rooms.description:
This cold stone room has the corpes of some rich family lined upon the walls.
Taken over by the Assamites many years ago, it has served as a place 
to dispose of the specimens collected by the clan after their study.
Many dismembered corpes lie about the room.
Nearing the exit of this room you can see the dim light of the outside world,
the world above awaits you yet again.

roomtext_data.output:
$n whispers something, and a stone slab opens, alowing them to pass through.
The slab then closes behind them.
roomtext_data.name: all

rooms.name: Storage Room.
rooms.description:
This plain room is littered with what most would call a treasury but the 
Assamites have little use for such trinkets and so the modest wealth
within this room comes from the corpses of their studies.
Resting here until a member of the clan requiers it for use in a spell
or experiment.

rooms.name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.  An iron
grate is to the north and narrow gravel paths lead east and west.

exits.description: Through the solid iron bars you see the Concourse.
The gravel path leads eastwards between the dark evergreen trees.
The gravel path leads westwards between the dark evergreen trees.

rooms.name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

rooms.name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

rooms.name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

exits.description:
The gravel road continues southwards to an open space before a small
building.

rooms.name: In front of the Chapel
rooms.description:
You are on an open space before a small chapel.  A gravel road leads north
through the graveyard and the chapel entrance is to the south.

exits.description: The gravel path leads eastwards between the dark evergreen trees.
The chapel door is made of dark wood.
The gravel path leads westwards between the dark evergreen trees.

rooms.name: A Gravel Path in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on
the graveyard.  An old tomb is here.

exits.description: The gravel path continues eastwards towards a gravel road.

extra_descr_data.description:
It is a large rectangular slab of dark grey stone that has been placed face
up in the ground.  The name has been erased by the ravages of time.

rooms.name: In a dusty Tomb
rooms.description:
You are in a dark burial chamber beneath a large tomb stone.
The only exit appears to be up.

rooms.name: A Gravel Path in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on
the graveyard.  The path leads north and west.  An old tomb is here.

extra_descr_data.description:
It is a large rectangular slab of dark grey stone that has been placed face
up in the ground.  The name has been erased by the ravages of time.

The only exit appears to be up.

The only exit appears to be up.

rooms.name: A Gravel Path in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on
the graveyard.  The path leads north and east.  A small shed is to the west.

exits.description: It is a small black-painted shed with a wooden door.

rooms.name: In a shed in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are in a small shed that looks as if it is used to store all sorts of
gardening equipment.  The only exit appears to be through a door to the east.

rooms.name: A Gravel Path in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on
the graveyard.  The path leads south and west.  An old tomb is here.

extra_descr_data.description:

up in the ground.  The name has been erased by the ravages of time.

rooms.description:
You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on

exits.description: The gravel path continues eastwards towards a building of some sort.

extra_descr_data.description:
It is a large rectangular slab of dark grey stone that has been placed face

rooms.name: In a dusty Tomb
rooms.description:

The only exit appears to be up.

rooms.name: A Gravel Path in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on
the graveyard.  The path leads north and west.
An old tomb is in the ground here, and an larger tomb lies to the south.
The stone door of the larger tomb bears the symbol of clan Assamite.

exits.description: The gravel path continues westwards towards a building of some sort.

extra_descr_data.description:
It is a large rectangular slab of dark grey stone that has been placed face
up in the ground.  The name has been erased by the ravages of time.
